package.name: Mind
package.shortDescription: This is Mind theme, ported by me.

descriptionlist.description: This is Mind icon pack by not_kn0thing ported by me to iOS.
I do not design these, all credits go to not_kn0thing.
As this is an Android theme, some iOS icons are missing.

screenshot.description: This is how it'll look like.

changelog.change: All Icons are Circles! Thanks to Ahmad Nagy for it!
